import React from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import Products from '../components/Products'; import arrow from "../images/arrow_black.png"; class ProductsList extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { products: [], brands: [] } } fetchProducts = () => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products").then(res => { console.log(res.data.results); this.setState({ products: res.data.results }); }); } fetchBrands = () => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/").then(res => { this.setState({ brands: res.data }); }); } componentDidMount() { this.fetchProducts(); this.fetchBrands(); } componentWillReceiveProps(newProps) { if (newProps.token) { this.fetchProducts(); } } render() { return (
